resolution_id: Dynamic Speed Harmonization with MILP Optimization

actions: Activate MILP model for speed adjustments

justification: Optimal balance of low delay (1.7min), high feasibility (ETCS enforcement), and controlled side effects. MILP optimization ensures safety compliance while minimizing operational disruption through recoverable speed/dwell adjustments.

full_resolution.strategy_name: Dynamic Speed Harmonization with MILP Optimization
actions: Activate MILP model to calculate optimal speed adjustments for REG_3053 (reduce speed by 15-20%) while slightly accelerating REG_33003 where track conditions permit
Implement temporary speed restriction zones using ETCS Level 2 enforcement
Apply calculated dwell time extensions at Pavia station for REG_3053 using built-in recovery time buffers
Update TMS with revised predicted times using real-time rolling horizon rescheduling
full_resolution.expected_outcome: Achieves 180s headway within 8km without full stoppage, limiting REG_3053 delay to ≤90s
full_resolution.reasoning: Combines MILP's constraint-based safety with dynamic speed control historically effective in Lombardy region.
side_effects: Temporary capacity reduction on adjacent tracks
Potential knock-on delays ≤3min for following services
